content:
An interesting interactive model-data benchmarking tool from the ocean BGCWG meeting today:
https://www.ilamb.org/CMIP5v6/IOMB/

image.png

arXiv preprint at: Evaluation of CMIP models with IOMB: Rates of contemporary ocean carbon uptake linked with vertical temperature gradients and transport to the ocean interior
https://arxiv.org/abs/2202.12933
